def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x,y,z in permutations(config):
            check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_xyz_same_size = same_size([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_xyz_same_color = same_color([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_xyz_medium_gray = all([is_medium_size(dot, ctx) and is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
            if (
                check_xyz_line
                and check_xyz_same_size
                and check_xyz_same_color
                and check_xyz_medium_gray
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y,z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_medium_black = is_medium_size(x, ctx) and is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_y_medium = is_medium_size(y, ctx)
            check_y_lighter_x = is_lighter(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_left_x = is_left(y, x, ctx)
            check_x_above_y = is_above(x, y, ctx)
            if (
                check_xy_medium_black
                and check_y_medium
                and check_y_lighter_x
                and check_y_left_x
                and check_x_above_y
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
